thread.section_title: TheMirrorCompany.Com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TheMirrorCompany.Com | themirrorcompany.com | 2 of 21
thread.title: Connie Weidig:

author: Connie Weidig:
title: Connie Weidig:
text: I had a great experience working with The Mirror Company from the beginning to the end. I was apprehensive at first because they could not give me a date of delivery at time of order, but the mirrors came within window of time they predicted when I ordered. I had called several local mirror companies and they could not come close to the price of The Mirror Company. The mirrors were installed by 2 young men from Cleveland and they could not have done a better job. They were polite and friendly and the mirrors look awesome. They told me the best cleaner to use and how to maintain them. I highly recommend working with The Mirror Company.
